p.k: Abigail and her husband have been invited to his business partners home to swim in his pool on a hot day. Her husband is too preoccupied with work to relax and spend time with Abigail so she turns her attention to seducing his business partner. Once they're left alone, she takes the opportunity to tease Xander with her sexy body. It doesn't take long before she's sucking his big hard cock!
